trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There was one other sighting in Pittsburgh on or around September 5th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi was traviling south on rt 8 when i noticed a star like opbject in the SW sky. i pulled over to observe the object, during this time also witnessinmg two (2) comerical airiners flying in the general vecinity of the object. it was approxmetly 30-45 km away and was off to my SSW. i watched the object for approxmatly 4 min when it slowly faded out. it just disappeared. now im not crazy and i dont go lookin for alien space craft. but what i saw last night was on my mind and i had to tell post it somewhere where people would meet me without sceptsisim. now the real question is.. DID ANYONE ELSE SEE WHAT I DID???!!! please help me out here
